00029 #ifndef CELLWISEDATA_HPP_
00030 #define CELLWISEDATA_HPP_
00031 
00032 #include "ChasteSerialization.hpp"
00033 #include "SerializableSingleton.hpp"
00034 #include <boost/serialization/vector.hpp>
00035 
00036 #include "MeshBasedCellPopulation.hpp"
00037 
00043 template<unsigned DIM>
00044 class CellwiseData : public SerializableSingleton<CellwiseData<DIM> >
00045 {
00046     friend class TestCellwiseData;
00047 
00048 private:
00049 
00051     static CellwiseData* mpInstance;
00052 
00054     AbstractCellPopulation<DIM>* mpCellPopulation;
00055 
00057     bool mAllocatedMemory;
00058 
00060     unsigned mNumberOfVariables;
00061 
00063     std::vector<double> mData;
00064 
00066     std::vector<double> mConstantDataForTesting;
00067 
00069     bool mUseConstantDataForTesting;
00070 
00072     friend class boost::serialization::access;
00079     template<class Archive>
00080     void serialize(Archive & archive, const unsigned int version)
00081     {
00082         bool is_set_up = IsSetUp();
00083         archive & is_set_up;
00084         if (is_set_up)
00085         {
00086             archive & mpCellPopulation;
00087             archive & mAllocatedMemory;
00088             archive & mNumberOfVariables;
00089             archive & mData;
00090             archive & mConstantDataForTesting;
00091             archive & mUseConstantDataForTesting;
00092         }
00093     }
00094 
00095 protected:
00096 
00100     CellwiseData();
00101 
00102 public:
00103 
00107     static CellwiseData* Instance();
00108 
00112     virtual ~CellwiseData();
00113 
00118     static void Destroy();
00119 
00128     double GetValue(CellPtr pCell, unsigned variableNumber=0);
00129 
00137     void SetValue(double value, unsigned locationIndex, unsigned variableNumber=0);
00138 
00144     void SetCellPopulation(AbstractCellPopulation<DIM>* pCellPopulation);
00145 
00149     AbstractCellPopulation<DIM>& rGetCellPopulation();
00150 
00158     void SetNumCellsAndVars(unsigned numCells, unsigned numVars);
00159 
00165     void SetConstantDataForTesting(std::vector<double>& rValues);
00166 
00170     bool IsSetUp();
00171 
00176     void ReallocateMemory();
00177 
00181     unsigned GetNumVariables();
00182 };
00183 
00184 #endif /*CELLWISEDATA_HPP_*/
